full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Evaluation and Statistical Performance Review of DFO 2009 Policy

#### Title:
Evaluation and Statistical Performance Review of the Technical Elements of PA Policy, DFO 2009

#### Contract Reference Number:
CB-4254-65267908

#### Publication Date:
March 14, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date:
April 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

#### Expected Contract Start Date:
April 27, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date:
March 31, 2025

#### Contract Value:
N/A

#### Brief Description:
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking the services of one or more senior fisheries science analysts to provide an evaluation and statistical performance review of the technical elements of DFO's "A Fishery Decision-Making Framework Incorporating the Precautionary Approach" (PA Policy, DFO 2009).

#### Key Objectives:
- Evaluate the technical elements of the PA Policy across diverse species life histories and data availabilities
- Perform technical analyses of potential revisions, additions, or clarifications to the PA Policy
- Take into account international best practices in the sustainable management of fisheries under the precautionary approach

#### Contract Period:
The proposed contract period is from the contract award date to March 31, 2025, with an irrevocable option to extend the contract by one year.

#### Eligible Regions:
Canada

#### Trade Agreements:
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Contact Information:
- Name: Tammy O'Toole
- Email: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
- Phone: (343) 550-1758

#### Tender Documents:
- [Evaluation and Statistical Performance Review Tender Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/t
